    • Method Detail

      • place

        public abstract int place(android.text.style.DynamicDrawableSpan drawable,
                          int height,
                          int viewHeight,
                          int width,
                          int viewWidth,
                          int offset,
                          android.graphics.Point scale,
                          ContentView.Options options,
                          boolean allowDefer)
        Parameters:
        drawable - - DynamicDrawableSpan to place in layout
        height - - available height (or -1 if no limit)
        viewHeight - - view height (if > -1 )
        width - - available width (to end of line)
        viewWidth - - view width
        offset - - character position in text, given to TextLayout
        scale - - accept result 'size' of drawable
        options - - ContentView.Options
        Returns:
        encoded rule
